email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 20-25. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the high 40s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but the current market is quite tight. The best I can do is $50.00 per ton. Regarding demurrage, it’s set at $25,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $50.00 per ton is acceptable, but could we push the laycan to October 22-27? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Let me know if these adjustments are feasible. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve checked with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to October 22-27. However, the demurrage rate is firm at $25,000 per day due to the vessel’s tight schedule. Let me know if you’re okay to proceed. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the flexibility on the laycan. We can accept the demurrage terms as proposed. Please confirm the final details, and we’ll proceed with the fixture. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! I’ll prepare the fixture recap with the following details: Freight rate at $50.00 per ton, laycan October 22-27, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. I’ll send the recap shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best regards, Sarah.
